# ğŸ† Active Bounties

Track open bounties and claim your karma!

## How Bounties Work

1. Find an issue with the `bounty` label
2. Comment "Claiming this bounty"
3. Submit a PR that fixes the issue
4. Earn bonus karma!

## Bounty Values

| Difficulty | Bonus Karma |
|------------|-------------|
| Easy | +10 |
| Medium | +25 |
| Hard | +50 |
| Epic | +100 |

## Current Bounties

*No active bounties yet!*

Be the first to create a bounty by:
1. Opening an issue
2. Adding the `bounty` label
3. Describing the task

## Claimed Bounties

| Bounty | Hunter | Status |
|--------|--------|--------|
| *None yet* | - | - |
